text: Achinos () is a village and community in the municipal unit of Echinaioi, municipality of Stylida, in Phthiotis, Central Greece. As of the 2011 census, the community had a population of 816, and the village had 726. The community has several villages other than Achinos (2011 population in parentheses): *Drepano Δρέπανο (2) *Drosia Δροσιά (7) *Kouvela Κουβέλα (65) *Paralia Achinou Παραλία Αχινού (12) *Platanias Πλατανιάς (4) *Skasmada Σκασμάδα (0) ==References== Category:Populated places in Phthiotis Category:Villages in Greece
title: Achinos, Phthiotis
